text: Travel update: Broadstone Road, Reddish is closed due to an RTC. Please find alternative route. #TfGMTraffic

user.description: The voice of Transport for Greater Manchester. This account is monitored 7am-8pm Mon-Fri & 8am-8pm Sat-Sun. Follow @MCRMetrolink for Metrolink services updates.
